arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ اِنِّيْ اَسْئَلُكَ فِيْ اَكْلِيْ وَ شُرْبِيْ السَّلاَمَةَ مِنْ وَعْكَهِ
وَ اَنْ تَشَجِّعْنِيْ بِقُوَّتِهَا عَلَى عِبَادَتِكَ
وَ اَنْ تُلْهِمَنِيْ حُسْنَ التَّحْرِرِ مِنْ مَعْصِيَتِكَ
translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
O Allah, bless Muhammad and his family.
O Allah, I ask You, in my eating and drinking, safety from illness,
and strength from it to obey You
and remember You and be thankful to You,
as long as it remains in my body,
and through its strength encourage me towards Your worship
and inspire me to refrain from Your disobedience.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
allāhumma innī as-aluka fī aklī wa shur-bis salāmata min wa`kah
wa an tulhimanī ḥusnat taḥriri min ma`ṣiyatik
